name: My Talking Bella 2
description:
Now bella is now onto your city home and help players make the deer stay busy

- Feed bella with some healthy snacks

- Put bella to toilet

- Put bella to sleep

- Play mini-games with bella

- Go to the fridge and buy something healthier

- Potions are energy potion, max potion, hunger potion

- You may also pet her

- More epic activities like cooking, dancing and play on the violin

- Level up for a birthday party

- Get presents an each day

New game coming soon link here https://www.tiktok.com

Your web apolinariacandy.bubbleapps.io
